thread.title: Judge rejects Libous’ push for new trial
thread.title_full: Judge rejects Libous’ push for new trial - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Judge rejects Libous’ push for new trial
text: A federal judge has rejected former state Sen. Thomas Libous’ fight to have his felony conviction tossed, ruling that the evidence presented to jurors in July was enough to show he lied to the FBI. U.S. District Judge Vincent Briccetti late last week denied a series of motions filed by Libous’ attorney, which had argued the jury’s [...] The post Judge rejects Libous’ push for new trial appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
